ratings.en: Sôku: Shukumei no kaikô!
Senritsu! Okehazama no sôgû
Fûraibô Maeda Keiji!
Yureru hi no hana: Hi wo yobu shingi
Nagashino-Shitaragahara no gisen
Azuchi-jô tenshu ashita wo kaketa shitô!!
Keppû daigaran! Kojirô zettai zetsumei
Kai no tora, Midaigawa ni shisu!
Mitsuhide no muhon! Honnô-ji daienjô!!
Ryakudatsu no kyôyû! Sôryû gekka no shinken shôbu
Sakareta kizuna Masamune kutsujoku no taikyaku
Yukimura saikifunô!? Date-gun namida no kaisan!!
Ransei futatabi! Rekkai butei Toyotomi Hideyoshi kourin!
Rosuto migi me wa, Gashed doragon wa e modoru yo
Tsukasa tai Toshiie! Tetorigawa de kanjo o fukutsu no chissoku!
Keiji tai Toshiie! Tetorigawa ni musebu yuzurenu omoi!
Seigan no kokuin! Dokuganryuu tai gunshin hitotoribashi no taiji!
Kyoui no Toyotomi Moori doumei! Unabara o saku wa no gouken!!
Sainantan-Satsuma no Chi e! Yukimura, Aratanaru Otoko no Deai!
Tomogaki to no Kanashiki Saikai Môshû Kizamareshi Hi no Kioku!
Setouchi no Gekitotsu! Hi o Fuku Umi no Daiyosai-Fugaku!!
Ryû to Oni Owari no Gekitotsu! Bakusô! Date-Chôsokabe Rengô Gun!!
Fukkatsu no Wakaki Tora! Kaizô Daiyôsai-Nichirin no Kyôi, Higashi e!!
Hasô Toyotomi Daihontai! Honki no Keiji, Danchô no Battô!!
Sôkô Kesshisen! Gekitô no Hate ni Fuku Kaze no Oto yo!!
Ryûko, Itadaki no Chikai! Atsuki Mirai e Kakeru Tamashii!!
